features: Contains: 1- 60 Pod Bag of Grab Green Natural Lavender with Vanilla 3in1 Laundry Detergent Pods. Our velcro closure bags are convenient and easy to use, no hassling with frustrating zip closures

Naturally Effective: Specifically formulated to cut through dirt leaving your laundry clean and fresh. Free of any optical brighteners, chlorine or dyes, these pods work on all water temperatures in standard and HE machines
Lavender with Vanilla: Our convenient, pre-measured pods provide a relaxing, soft and delicate natural fragrance. Just drop one in your washer and deep-clean, remove stains, and brighten, all in one

No Harsh Chemicals: Our laundry solutions are septic safe and made from naturally derived plant and mineral based ingredients to ensure the best cleaning products with no phosphates, phthalates, chlorine, toxins, dyes or masking agents

Safer for You, Your Family and the Planet: Grab Green's plant and mineral-based formulas are made with responsibly-sourced, high-quality ingredients that are proudly cruelty-free, never tested on animals and made in the USA
body.description: Save time and money with Grab Green 3 in 1 Laundry Detergent Pods. These concentrated pods feature a superior detergent, remarkable stain remover and beautiful brightener, all in one convenient pre-measured powder pod. Tackle your most difficult laundry challenges, without harmful toxins or carcinogens. Our relaxing lavender with vanilla fragrance is made with lavender, lavandin, patchouli and eucalyptus essential oils. Our thoughtful packaging includes a convenient, easy to use velcro closure and clear use instructions. We believe in full ingredient disclosure—what we call True Transparency—which is why we list every ingredient and the purpose for each ingredient on every package. To protect your family, we developed our powder pods to contain multiple layers of safety: simple, white powder pods don't look like irresistible colorful candy. They are difficult to swallow. Grab Green is a female and mother owned and operated company that provides naturally derived and non-toxic laundry, home cleaning, and personal care products 100% made in the USA. Our products are eco-responsible and ensure safe and effective cleaning power for a healthy, happy home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our philosophy simply! Cleaning is not only about what you remove, but what you add as well. As a mother of two daughters and two furry four-legged doggies, having a safe and healthy home was always Patricia Spencer’s top priority. Trusted, go-to products. We’re all for that! Laundering Made Simple Powerful powder tackles your most difficult laundry challenges, without harmful toxins or carcinogens. We source the finest ingredients & adjust our formulas to ensure the best laundry detergent. The Velcro closures easily open and close—meaning no more hassles with finicky zips. Package design clearly states what the product does, how to use it, and lists the ingredients in detail. 3-in-1: Superior detergent, remarkable stain remover, beautiful brightener. Highest quality naturally-derived plant & mineral-based ingredients for superior formulas. Available in 3 delightful fragrances + fragrance free. Convenient, concentrated pre-measured pods. Formulated for standard & high-efficiency machines; works in all temperatures. Made in the USA with domestic & imported components.

Effective We’ve invested years into scientific development to find the right balance of plant and mineral based ingredients that ensure safe and effective cleaning power! Our concentrated non-toxic formulas are packed with power and are formulated to go beyond existing responsible products and compete with conventional products. Responsible We love our planet and take every opportunity to use packaging that is, and that utilizes post consumer resins. Our goal is to use as few materials as possible. We also love animals, and make sure our formulas are never tested on them! Healthier At Grab Green we believe in true Transparency, we want you to know what’s in each product and why. That’s why you’ll find a complete list of ingredients on every product. Our products are made with non-toxic ingredients - no phthalates, solvents, ammonia, phosphates, fillers, optical brighteners, masking agents or dyes. *Certified Effective/Naturally Derived Formula by EPA 02/2018 Fragrant Our fragrances are designed to envelop you in the beauty of nature. Each has been hand-crafted using oils to awaken the mood you seek and leave you feeling enlivened and rejuvenated. Effective Responsible Healthy Fragrant
Fragrance Free Lavender with Vanilla Vetiver Gardenia 24 loads ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 60 loads ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 132 loads ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 605 loads ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

Patricia's Tips Choosing the right detergent Among the many safe, naturally-derived, plant and mineral based detergents is Grab Green’s 3-in-1 Laundry Detergent Pods. Though teeny tiny in size, the 3-in-1 Laundry Detergent Pods cleans thoroughly, removes big stains, and brightens clothes all at once. Loading the machine properly Make sure all the cuffs on your jeans and shirts are uncuffed,all zippers on jackets are zipped up, all drawstrings on coats and sweats are tightly tied together. Unbutton all buttoned shirts. Check the pockets of all your jeans and coats. Don’t stuff clothes Overloading the washing machine can result in unwanted wrinkles on your garments, and less room for the soapy bubbles to move around. Always leave a little room in your machine to keep your items wrinkle-free and squeaky clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells really REALLY fresh
reviews.reviewText: I really don’t leave a lot of reviews, but this deserves one. I’m 9 months pregnant and decided to start reading labels on things I use around the house and wasn’t impressed with the detergent I’d been using, which led me to search for something a little less bad for us. I bought the smaller package to just give it a try since I’m so sensitive to smell currently, and I’m seriously IN LOVE. The smell is fresher than fresh. I’ve had these pods in the house for less than 48 hrs and I’ve already washed our plethora of blankets and bedding and everything I can get my hands on that “needs washing” before baby gets here. Besides the scent being perfection, everything feels so clean. I’ve used tide for the majority of my laundering lifetime and idk if anything’s been as clean as it feels now. Anyway… these pods are fabulous. I’d give ‘em an 11/5 if I could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Subtle Beautiful Smell, Exceptional Cleaning Power
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. The lavender smell does not have that “ commercial” smell like so many others. Also it can REALLY clean. I use it for all my warm loads. It gets the stains out much better than sone more costly brands and powder detergent simply often cleans better and/ or is required. I do a lot of laundry and am a clean freak. I have two dogs. I don’t want them, me, or anyone swimming in chemicals. It leaves clothes clean, soft, and has a gentle hue of vanilla and lavender that lingers vs making me itch or giving me a headache. Now on too making this product in a Rose smell 💐

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells nice but not like Vetiver
reviews.reviewText: I like this detergent. To be clear, it does NOT smell like actual vetiver (if you’ve ever smelled the essential oil). While the scent is light, it’s more of a perfume-y blend of its own than pure vetiver. I actually don’t smell vetiver at all. That said, it’s good for washing sheets or towels and making them smell nice. Wouldn’t personally want my clothes to smell like it because I like to wear my own scents. I haven’t had the issues with dissolving like some of the other reviews noted. I dissolve mine in a cup of warm water first and dump it into the wash, which takes all of 10 seconds. I recommend if you have $20 to spare, give it a try and see if you like the smell!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Laundry made easy
reviews.reviewText: This product cleans without pre-treating and leaves a fresh smell even after the laundry is put away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use two pods for a full load of laundry. 3 pods for soiled laundry. It smells great. I am relieved that it is not toxic for me or our water system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little pods providing they are still in one piece when delivered
reviews.reviewText: I was a little taken back when I saw how small these little pods are but one will do a whole normal load of wash.(I use a top loader) They clean very well and I was surprised. They leave a nice mild scent to clothes. Nothing over bearing, and the scent after dried is very mild.I am sensitive to a lot of detergents and so far, I haven't had any problems with these.The only thing I don't like is they don't automatically dissolve like it states. I ended up having to put them in a cup of hot water and mixing it to get them to completely dissolve. I used them in one piece when I washed some curtains awhile back and it left white streaks. So I have been having to dissolve them. I can also put them in the washer and make sure they are dissolved well before I add the clothes and it seems to work ok that way.But to just pitch in the machine and add clothes and hope it all dissolves, I wouldn't hold my breath.Update 3-2015:I planned to keep using this.Unfortunately the next to last time I ordered this it came completely smashed up all but maybe 3 were broken pods.The next order about 1/4 of them were smashed up. This may be the last time I order this if it can't be packed more securely. It's a shame as I really do like the detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2012
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this product in the Winter and received the first package with many of the pre-measured packets burst inside the outer packaging. I called and requested a replacement and one was shipped which also had packets that had burst however, not as many as the first shipment so I kept the second package. I have ordered other GrabGreen products with pre-measure packets in Winter and only experienced packet bursting during shipment with the GrabGreen 3-in-1 Laundry detergent. I do not think it is movement during shipping which is causing the packets to burst since the inside package is well contained to reduce such movement. I suspect the product is freezing during shipment and there is moisture in the product to cause the packets to burst during expansion when freezing or frozen. The packet skins are tightly sealed without much wiggle room for expansion if freezing is the issue.I wanted to try this product as I have tried other GrabGreen products and like their pre-measured packets including how well the other products performed. Since I tend to use more laundry detergent when using liquid I found with the packets I use less detergent. The packets fully dissolved for me when placed in the machine and not the dispenser as directed by the manufacturer. My clothes came out clean however, my Winter laundry is typically lightly soiled and I will need to wait until Spring to try this product with heavily soiled clothing. To me clothes which are clean should be absent of dirt, stains and heavy scents. The fragrance free product, which I used, does not add any artificial scent. Clean clothes to me should be odor free and smell like -- nothing.As for oil there is no brand of detergent that gets oil out well so I always pre-treat oil spots with dish soap. Soap products are different than detergents and are designed to breakdown oils and wash them away whereas, bio based stains seem to do best with an oxygen based booster. There really is not an all-in-one product that will work well with heavily soiled laundry unless you pre-treat, and/or adjust the amount of detergent and/or the length of the wash cycle. It can be expected that you will need to adjust how you wash clothes based on the amount of soil, type of soil, water conditions, washer effectiveness, type of clothing, etc. The manufacturer did recommended increasing the number of packets used if washing heavily soiled clothing.Overall, I am finding the packet system already takes up less storage space, lighter and easier to lift, less bulky and easier to handle, pre-measured so no need to measure, dissolves completely without leaving any residue and does not scent my clothes. High efficiency machines use much less water and powders typically require more water to dissolve powdered detergents completely which is why I went to liquid detergents. So far I have not found any powdered detergent clumps on my clothes with this product and when I do my laundry I typically place the pre-measured packet in the washing machine first then load the clothes.The big test of softness for me is how soft are my dark colors. I always hang-dry dark colors, since drying them in the dryer causes major fading, so having them less wrinkled and not cardboard like once dry is a plus! My rating today is based on my overall experience with the product which includes the use, purchase, shipping and return of 1 damaged shipment out of 2 damaged shipments for this product. I will likely purchase this item again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this so much! It brightens like it says, it cleans great and gets rid of smells amazing. This is my new laundry detergent. 😊
Works well, smells good, but too expensive… :(

This was delivered so fast which was much appreciated. I have been looking for a while to find a non toxic detergent that still offered a nice non-overbearing scent to my clothes. I am in love with this stuff! I can’t wait to try the other scents out.I was a little skeptical after reading some of the other reviews about how it left white residue from not breaking down properly and I haven’t had that issue at all. I think as long as you don’t over pack your washer there shouldn’t be an issue.
smell is so good. works great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Dissolves quickly, cleans well, strong-ish scent
reviews.reviewText: The pods dissolve very quickly which I like because I don't like tossing my clothes in the wash until the detergent has mixed in with some water. The scent is a bit strong for my liking but I'm a bit fussy that way. As for cleaning power it's no better or worse than any other brand. Very good value here.
